titleStmt.title: An answer to a late paper intituled a true copy of a paper written by Capt. Tho. Walcot in Newgate after his condemnation and delivered to his son immediately before his execution : being also his last speech at the place of execution / by Robert West.
titleStmt.author: West, Robert, fl. 1683.
Walcot, Thomas, d. 1683.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and are to be sold by Walter Davis,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
